levelList.name: Крик из пещер
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1

coindescs.desc: [EndSkill] Apply 10% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and 1 other ally with the least current HP, and apply 2 <sprite name="ShieldManagerCryingToad"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="ShieldManagerCryingToad">Слезинка</link></u></color> as well
- At 4+ highest Reson., apply it to 1 more ally

- If the affected unit already has <sprite name="ShieldManagerCryingToad"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="ShieldManagerCryingToad">Слезинка</link></u></color>, change the <sprite name="ShieldManagerCryingToad"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="ShieldManagerCryingToad">Слезинка</link></u></color> value to 2

- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 <sprite name="ShieldManagerCryingToad"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="ShieldManagerCryingToad">Слезинка</link></u></color>' and 'change the <sprite name="ShieldManagerCryingToad"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="ShieldManagerCryingToad">Слезинка</link></u></color> value to 3' instead.
